channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime tree in need of serious maintenance - tree suckers at the bottom of the tree and up the trunk, and branches growing too close to the house., 25th June
item.description:
On Central Cross Drive next to the side wall of Cleeve House, 34 Albert Road (between the footpath and the road).

Report on FixMyStreet
